name: Floor Falls
description:
A short puzzle game with three levels. The third level is the most difficult. 

Made for Ludum Dare game jam 49, with theme "Unstable".

Made using Puzzlescript.

Controls: 

  • Z is undo
  • R is restart
  • WASD or arrow keys for movement 
  • M is mute

Mobile-friendly link/source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=b8ea600df4a977daf1a91ede585c8241
